'''Epitome Invocation''' is a [[Weapon Event Wish]] in [[Version 4.7]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2024-06-05 11:00:00 UTC+8 &mdash; 2024-06-25 17:59:00

===Summary===
* During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapon {{Wish Item|Absolution;Light of Foliar Incision}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapon {{Wish Item|Lithic Spear}} as well as the 4-star weapons {{Wish Item|Sacrificial Sword;Sacrificial Greatsword;The Widsith;The Stringless}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During the event wish, use [[Epitomized Path]] to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as {{Wish Item|Absolution}} or {{Wish Item|Light of Foliar Incision}}. For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.
* Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
